cause.description:
See tenets of Humane Society of Canada: You can send funds straight to the Humane Society of Canada via the Donate button at the top of their page at: http://www.humanesociety.com/.
1. Help Us Bring Hope to Animals Asks The Humane Society of Canada
2. the passage of laws to regulate the pet food industry that include a balanced system of enforcement, education and consumer awareness to prevent these widespread tragedies from taking place again
cause.mission: Support Welfare of Animals in Canada at http://www.humanesociety.com/
cause.name: http://www.humanesociety.com/
